thread.title: This Dog Woke Up And, Uh-Oh, She's Surrounded By Cats - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: This Dog Woke Up And, Uh-Oh, She's Surrounded By Cats - BuzzFeed News

author: Salvador Hernandez
title: This Dog Woke Up And, Uh-Oh, She's Surrounded By Cats - BuzzFeed News
text:
She’s the newest addition to Cherie Priest’s family in Chattanooga, Tennessee. She and her husband also have a 5-year-old mix, Grayson, and two cats named Spain The Cat and Quinn. 
Lucy was adopted back in August and has been getting along great with the multi-species crew.
That is, until she found herself suddenly surrounded Saturday morning.
ID: 10725923 3. Like, completely surrounded. Lucy, outnumbered by cats.
— Cherie Priest (@cmpriest) ID: 10725823 4. Here. View this image › 
Via Cherie Priest ID: 10725873 5. There. View this image › 
Via Cherie Priest ID: 10725874 6. Shit. View this image › 
Via Cherie Priest ID: 10725876 7. Halp! View this image › 
Via Cherie Priest ID: 10725877 Priest said she captured the moment Saturday morning while putting on makeup. 
Lucy likes to squeeze in between the couch and ottoman for a quick nap, but didn’t notice when her two cats perched themselves around her. 
“She just kinda sat up and realized they were there,” she said. 
All. Around. Her.
“She’s always just got a crazy face, and she gets along really well with the cats,” Priest said. “She looks like she has fake googley eyes on her.”
Her eyes are a very light blue, which means can look super expressive at times. . 
“She’s the most expressive dog,” she said.
ID: 10725956 9. And she doesn’t take any B.S. from anyone, apparently. View this image › 
Via Cherie Priest ID: 10725965 Despite the look of shock, Priest said Lucy gets along great with her new family. 
She plays well with her canine and feline siblings, even Spain The Cat who is 19 years old and basically the Alpha of the four.
“Lucy is a sweetheart, and she’s very gentle,” Priest said.
ID: 10725969 11. And a good girl. View this image › 
Via Cherie Priest ID: 10725981 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Salvador Hernandez is a reporter for BuzzFeed News and is based in Los Angeles. Contact Salvador Hernandez at salvador.hernandez@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
